name: Yellow Survivors Hacked
description:
Original Game by bastikadu

-Controls-

Up: W

Down: S

Left: A

Right: D

Reset Hacks: 0

Foreshadowing (see where the apple is going to go next): 7

Freeze (freeze the game for a better analysis - use 5 to toggle): 8

Double Points (get 2x the times of Double Points): 9

More Apples: Check Menu Bottom Left

Superepic by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com
